product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Skeleton Frame
long_description: Use the light and versatile Sony Action Cam skeleton frame to help protect your wearable camcorder and expand your mounting options with optional mounts for headband or handlebar (sold separately). Easily access all your cable connections on your Sony wearable camcorder body. Mount via adjustable tripod screw on right, left or top side of camera.
short_description: Use the light and versatile Sony Action Cam skeleton frame to help protect your wearable camcorder and expand your mounting options with optional mounts for headband or handlebar (sold separately).
